title: are the servers down?
body: I was in a normal game of leauge of legends when the reconnected bar showed up it was there for a long time so I turned my int on my laptop off and back on nothing still so I exit leauge it wouldnt reconnect still now i cant even login did something happen? NA

replies.body:
Hey guys, is this still an issue?  I'm seeing a few posts on this and trying to figure out what happened.  

As a heads up, there will be downtime late tonight as we prep for the patch per the [service status](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#na).
nope mine was fixed the same night and I was in norms so no biggy.

It may help, may not, but I was kicked aswell (posted too) ipconfig  flushdns didn't do anything. TBH I think it had to do with a bridge from Comcast. It seems that not everyone with Comcast was affected, but most of the people that were affected had Comcast and were in the Chicago + east coast area. Phone, TV, and the rest of the internet worked fine.

Probably just the region. Won't go to the loading screen after countdown and you just get hit with a leaver buster/leaver and hf getting out of a 20 minute queue time penalty for not being able to connect to a ranked game.

It seems to happen all to often tho, the leaver buster system screwing people over when riot's client has issues, as much as i love my new shiny 20 minute leaver buster, this is starting to get really annoying.
Got dc'd and leaverbuster'd from ranked

If this issue persists, contact support" and sat at authenticating forever, and keeps repeating that message.
